item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi, I am Ridwan Fadjar Septian. I am a passionate IT Engineer who took specialization in software (backend) and cloud infrastructure engineering. I have hands-on experience for 8+ years. Currently, I am living in Indonesia. I have interests in DevOps, cloud infrastructure development, high scalable systems, serverless computing, container orchestration, IT governance, IT security and many more. My favorite quote is: “Customer satisfaction is first priority”. Currently, I am working as Cloud Infrastructure Engineer at NiceDay Nederland B.

item.title: Achievements
item.description: I have completed some training or courses. Here they are. Completion Badges Google Cloud Skill Boost Badges Microsoft Learn Badges LeetCode Badges Training or Courses 2022 Coursera - Site Reliability Engineering: Measuring and Managing Reliability by Google Cloud Coursera - Architecting with Google Kubernetes Engine Specialization by Google Cloud 2021 Dicoding - Architecting on AWS (Membangun Arsitektur Cloud di AWS) by Dicoding Indonesia Dicoding - Cloud Practitioner Essentials (Belajar Dasar AWS Cloud) by Dicoding Indonesia Redis University - (FREE) RU301: Running Redis at Scale Redis University - (FREE) RU330: Redis Security by Redis Lab Redis University - (FREE) RU101: Introduction to Redis Data Structures by Redis Lab Cockroach University - (FREE) Introduction to Distributed SQL and CockroachDB by Cockroach Lab Udemy - (FREE) Linux Operating System Fundamentals by Linux Academy 2019

item.title: Certification
item.description: Currently, I am certified as: Google Cloud Platform - Cloud Digital Leader

item.title: Talks
item.description: I used to be speaker in some meetup or conferences such as: Django Application Monitoring and Logging with Sentry, ELK (Elasticsearch, Logstash & Kibana) and Prometheus (Online).
